name: Navia
storytitle: Helm of the Radiant Rose: Navia
source: Reward for inviting Navia to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Ceremonial Crystalshot
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116084]</color> to this character. $[K56] up to 5 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116081]</color> from your Hand. Each card you $[K56] causes this to deal +1 DMG, and you draw 1 card.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>, attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>Geo Infusion</color> to this character. <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color> up to 5 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Crystal Shrapnel</color> from your Hand. Each card you <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color> causes this to deal +1 DMG, and you draw 1 card.
skills.description: Deals 3 Geo DMG, attaches Geo Infusion to this character. Discard up to 5 Crystal Shrapnel from your Hand. Each card you Discard causes this to deal +1 DMG, and you draw 1 card.

skills.name: As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals 1 $[K5] to all opposing characters on standby. Summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116082]</color> and creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116081]</color> card before adding it to your Hand.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>, deals 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters on standby. Summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Rosula Dorata Salute</color> and creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Crystal Shrapnel</color> card before adding it to your Hand.
skills.description: Deals 1 Geo DMG, deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby. Summons 1 Rosula Dorata Salute and creates 1 Crystal Shrapnel card before adding it to your Hand.

skills.name: Mutual Assistance Network
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>After an opponent's character takes Crystallize reaction DMG:</color> Create 3 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116081]</color> and randomly place them into your deck.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>After an opponent's character takes Crystallize reaction DMG:</color> Create 3 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Crystal Shrapnel</color> and randomly place them into your deck.
skills.description: (Passive) After an opponent's character takes Crystallize reaction DMG: Create 3 Crystal Shrapnel and randomly place them into your deck.
